title: John Muir National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       John Muir National Historic Site News Releases  Please note that only current news releases will be available on the News Releases page. When the news release has expired, it will be moved to the Archive link. If you have any questions, please contact the person(s) listed on the release or you may contact the park Superintendent, who can also be reached via the Management link.
